name: kubernetes-platform-engineer
description: Kubernetes platform engineering plugin for cluster management, configuration development, monitoring, security, and CI/CD with support for standard K8s, K3s, Talos, Flatcar, and GitOps
author: Eric Austin <e@plsr.io>

agents.name: k8s-orchestrator
agents.description: Main orchestrator for coordinating Kubernetes platform engineering tasks across specialized agents

agents.name: k8s-config-developer
agents.description: Develops Kubernetes manifests for standard K8s and K3s distributions

agents.name: helm-chart-developer
agents.description: Develops and maintains Helm charts for Kubernetes applications

agents.name: k8s-cluster-manager
agents.description: Manages Kubernetes clusters using kubectl and other tools for deployments, rollbacks, and operations

agents.name: k8s-monitoring-analyst
agents.description: Analyzes monitoring data and provides optimization recommendations

agents.name: k8s-security-reviewer
agents.description: Reviews Kubernetes configurations and architectures for security vulnerabilities

agents.name: k8s-network-engineer
agents.description: Engineers cluster networking with CNIs including Cilium and Calico

agents.name: talos-linux-expert
agents.description: Specialist for Talos Linux-based Kubernetes clusters

agents.name: flatcar-linux-expert
agents.description: Specialist for Flatcar Container Linux-based Kubernetes clusters

agents.name: cicd-engineer
agents.description: CI/CD specialist for GitOps with ArgoCD, Flux, and container workflows

agents.name: cdk8s-engineer
agents.description: Develops Kubernetes configurations using CDK8s (Cloud Development Kit for Kubernetes)

commands.name: k8s-setup-gitops
commands.description: Setup GitOps CI/CD with ArgoCD or Flux
